actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To direct the President, acting through the National Disaster Medical System, to reimburse States for expenses incurred in providing treatment for health conditions and illnesses resulting, directly or indirectly, from the earthquake in Haiti on January 12, 2010.
short_title: Emergency Health Services for Haitian Earthquake Victims Act of 2010
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: Emegency Health Services for Haitian Earthquake Victims Act of 2010 - Directs the President, acting through the National Disaster Medical System, to reimburse states for expenses incurred in providing treatment for health conditions and illnesses resulting from the earthquake in Haiti on January 12, 2010.

titles.title: Emergency Health Services for Haitian Earthquake Victims Act of 2010

To direct the President, acting through the National Disaster Medical System, to reimburse States for expenses incurred in providing treatment for health conditions and illnesses resulting, directly or indirectly, from the earthquake in Haiti on January 12, 2010.
